articles.description: Uber and Lyft will work together to share information on US drivers and delivery people accused of sexual assault to ensure those individuals are banned on both platforms.
articles.content: Uber and Lyft will work together to share information on US drivers and delivery people accused of physical and sexual assault to ensure those individuals are banned on both platforms, the two compan… [+1550 chars]

articles.author: Hanna Ziady and Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: ECB will buy bonds at a faster pace to keep the recovery on track - CNN
articles.description: The European Central Bank plans to pick up the pace of its bond buying in the coming months to bolster the region's lackluster recovery from the coronavirus pandemic and counter a spike in borrowing costs.
